thread.title: Celebrity Approved Half-Bun Is All The Rage
thread.title_full: Celebrity Approved Half-Bun Is All The Rage

title: Celebrity Approved Half-Bun Is All The Rage
text:
facebook 121 SHARES 
Looking chic with minimal effort has become so much easier with the â€˜hun-bun' or half-bun hairstyle. And it seems like our favourite celebrities, too, are in love with this easy-to-do, and super stylish hairstyle. From Kriti Sanon to Shibani Dandekar and everyone in between, here are 10 celebrities who have been giving us half-bun hair-inspo. Sonakshi Sinha A photo posted by Sonakshi Sinha (@aslisona) on Feb 11, 2017 at 9:17pm PST Shibani Dandekar A photo posted by Shibani Dandekar (@shibanidandekar) on Feb 3, 2017 at 3:22am PST Lauren Gottlieb A photo posted by Lauren Gottlieb (@laurengottlieb) on Jan 20, 2017 at 4:49am PST Kriti Sanon A photo posted by Kriti (@kritisanon) on Jan 13, 2017 at 8:52am PST Amyra Dastur A photo posted by Amyra Dastur (@amyradastur93) on Jan 30, 2017 at 6:55pm PST Huma Qureshi A photo posted by Huma Qureshi (@iamhumaq) on Jan 18, 2017 at 8:20pm PST Sonam Kapoor A photo posted by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Jan 19, 2017 at 11:54am PST Amy Jackson A photo posted by Amy Jackson (@iamamyjackson) on Dec 31, 2016 at 5:27am PST Alia Bhatt A photo posted by Makeup Artist Puneet B Saini (@puneetbsaini) on Jan 9, 2017 at 9:07am PST Kangana Ranaut A photo posted by Kangana Ranaut ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ (@kanganaranaut) on Feb 12, 2017 at 9:36am PST Image credit: Instagram
